com.raceup.ed.bms

Class Bms

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.raceup.ed.bms.stream.ArduinoSerial
      • com.raceup.ed.bms.Bms
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StartAndStop, gnu.io.SerialPortEventListener, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener

    public class Bms
extends ArduinoSerial
implements java.lang.Runnable, StartAndStop
    Battery management system (with multithreading support) Provides data from arduino serial port
